metadata.name: Picking up some Love
metadata.description:
An artwork inspired from Instagram logo, the app which always listen, curate products and even suggest friends for us. 

A world where we are always seen and heard, but still trying hard to be understood!

This is an artistic take to understand the whole existence of 'love' & 'like's in social media. No one's self worth is based on the likes or followers they get on social media. The 'like' button is just a feature to trigger the reward system of your brain! 

These features in media, with or without knowing bring in a sense of inadequacy about your life or appearance. While scrolling through others life, these slowly crawl into the lives as anxiety and depression. This is a world, where your social connections in digital platforms has more value but also fails to have real in-person connections with ones near you. Again, bringing in more anxiety inducing scenarios for a person. 

Well, our minds matter and mental health matters & may you gather the strength to practice it!
